method.name: SetProperties

arg.name: room
arg.tp:docstring: An integer handle representing the room of the activity

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping properties names to the desired values

method.tp:docstring: Set the properties of the activity associated to the given room for this connection. You have to be the owner of this activity.

method.name: GetProperties

arg.name: room
arg.tp:docstring: An integer handle for the activity's room to request his properties for

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping properties names to their values

method.tp:docstring: Get the properties of a particular activity.

signal.name: ActivityPropertiesChanged

arg.name: room
arg.tp:docstring: An integer handle representing the room of the activity

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping properties names to their new values

signal.tp:docstring: Signal emitted when the properties of an activity are changed.

tp:docstring.p: An interface on connections to associate OLPC activity properties with rooms.
The following types and names are used to request and set properties:

dl.dd: The color of the activity. Format used is #RRGGBB,#RRGGBB (stroke,fill).
